Hi, I’m **James Peters** — a U.S. military veteran turned data professional with a deep passion for transforming messy data into meaningful insights.

I bring over **7 years of experience** in business analysis, including hands-on work with **SQL**, **SAS**, and **Oracle**, as well as advanced training in **Python, R, Power BI, and Six Sigma methodology**. My career has spanned financial services, airline operations, and process improvement — where I’ve helped teams move from gut instinct to data-backed decisions.

---

## 🔍 My Focus Areas

- 📊 **Analytics & Business Intelligence**  
  Crafting dashboards and reports that turn complex metrics into actionable stories.

- 🤖 **Data Science & Machine Learning**  
  Using models to uncover patterns, predict outcomes, and automate insight generation.

- 🛠️ **Process Optimization**  
  Leveraging Lean Six Sigma to streamline operations and reduce inefficiencies.

- 🌐 **Cloud & Data Engineering Foundations**  
  Actively developing skills in Azure and modern data infrastructure.

---

## 🎯 My Mission

> “Use data with integrity, clarity, and creativity — to improve systems, empower people, and make a difference.”

## 💡 Quick Facts

- 🧭 Purpose-driven. Detail-oriented. Systems thinker.
